instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install framer-motion @studio-freight/react-lenis lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
2. SETUP FONTS: Import Playfair Display and Montserrat from Google Fonts in index.css
3. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the color palette provided in design_system.colors
4. IMPLEMENT SMOOTH SCROLL: Wrap the entire application in <ReactLenis root>
5. BUILD COMPONENTS: Create reusable UI components (Button, Section, Card) using the styles defined.
6. ASSEMBLE PAGES: Build the Homepage sections (Hero, Stats, Services, Process, Portfolio, Contact).
7. ADD ANIMATIONS: Apply Framer Motion variants to all sections. Ensure text staggers and images fade up.
8. INTEGRATE FORMS: Use a simple form handler for the contact section.
9. VERIFY CONTRAST: Ensure all text over images has proper overlay or shadow.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid.
